5 kalmanFilter::kalmanFilter(int i)
6 {
7 id_ = i;
8 // max vol in w-h-m is around 3m so +-1.5m initial guess is good
9 ROS_INFO("Constructed blank filter");
10 cov_ = Eigen::MatrixXd(7, 7);
11 cov_ << 100,0,0,0,0,0,0, // Cov0 init 10m mistake initially
12 0,100,0,0,0,0,0, // Velocity? lets say +-1.25 (From min-max in data)
13 0,0,0,1.6,0,0,0,
14 0,0,0,0,1.6,0,0,
15 0,0,0,0,2.25,0,0,
16 0,0,0,0,0,2.25,0,
17 0,0,0,0,0,0,2.25;
18 Qt_ = Eigen::MatrixXd(7,7);
19 Qt_ << 0.25,0, 0,0, 0,0,0,
20 0,0.25, 0,0, 0,0,0,
21 0,0, 0.25,0, 0,0,0,
22 0,0, 0,0.25, 0,0,0,
23 0,0, 0,0, 0.2,0,0,
24 0,0, 0,0, 0,0.2,0,
25 0,0, 0,0, 0,0,0.2;
26
27 mean_ = Eigen::VectorXd(7);
28 mean_ << 5, 5, 0, 0, 1.5, 1.5, 1.5;
29 cov_p_ = cov_;
30 mean_p_ = mean_;
31 }
32
33 kalmanFilter::~kalmanFilter()
34 {
35 ROS_INFO("Goodbye");
36 }
37
38 void kalmanFilter::assign(measurement meas)
39 {
40 mean_ = common::toEigen(meas);
41 cov_p_ = cov_;
42 mean_p_ = mean_;
43 }
44
45 void kalmanFilter::iterate(measurement meas)
46 {
47 prediction();
48 measurementUpdate(common::toEigen(meas));
49 }
50
51 void kalmanFilter::prediction()
52 {
53 double delt = 1 / 14.0; // This is hardcoded, its basically message frequency or stamp diff
54 Eigen::MatrixXd At(7,7);
55 // x,y,xd,yd,volx,voly,volz
56 At << 1,0,delt,0,0,0,0,
57 0,1,0,delt,0,0,0,
58 0,0,1,0 ,0,0,0,
59 0,0,0,1 ,0,0,0,
60 0,0,0,0 ,1,0,0,
61 0,0,0,0 ,0,1,0,
62 0,0,0,0 ,0,0,1;
63 //Bt = 0;
64 mean_p_ = At*mean_;
65 Eigen::MatrixXd Rt(7,7);
66 // Process noise lets say 1m for position + 0.07*noise_in_velocity =~ 2?
67 double acc = 0.1; // Process noise could be acceleration term
68 Rt << pow(delt,4)*acc,0, pow(delt,3)*acc/2,0, 0,0,0,
69 0,pow(delt,4)*acc, 0,pow(delt,3)*acc/2, 0,0,0,
70 0,0, delt*delt*acc,0, 0,0,0,
71 0,0, 0,delt*delt*acc, 0,0,0,
72 0,0, 0,0, 0.1,0,0,
73 0,0, 0,0, 0,0.1,0,
74 0,0, 0,0, 0,0,0.1;
75 cov_p_ = At*cov_*At.transpose() + Rt;
76 mean_ = mean_p_;
77 cov_ = cov_p_;
78 }
79
80 void kalmanFilter::pdaUpdate(std::vector<std::pair<int,double>> match_vect, std::vector<measurement> measurements, double PD, double norm)
81 {
82 std::vector<Eigen::VectorXd> innovations;
83 std::vector<double> weights;
84 Eigen::VectorXd inv(7);
85 double b0 = (1-PD)*norm;
86 Eigen::MatrixXd Kgain(7,7);
87 Eigen::MatrixXd Ct(7,7);
88 Ct = Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(7,7);
89 Eigen::MatrixXd Pk(7,7);
90 Pk = Eigen::MatrixXd::Zero(7,7);
91 Eigen::MatrixXd Sk(7,7);
92 Eigen::VectorXd weighted_inv(7);
93 weighted_inv = Eigen::VectorXd::Zero(7);
94
95 Sk = Ct*cov_p_*Ct.transpose()+Qt_;
96 Kgain = (cov_p_*Ct.transpose())*Sk.inverse();
97 for(int id = 0; id < match_vect.size(); id++)
98 {
99 inv = (common::toEigen(measurements[match_vect[id].first]) - Ct*mean_p_);
100 innovations.push_back(inv);
101 weights.push_back(match_vect[id].second*norm);
102 ROS_INFO("Track %d, match %d, weight %.2f",this->id_, id, weights[id]);
103 weighted_inv += (weights[id]) * inv;
104 }
105 double add_cov = 0;
106 for(int i = 0; i < innovations.size(); i++)
107 {
108 Eigen::VectorXd temp(7);
109 temp = innovations[i];
110 double val1 = temp.transpose() * temp;
111 double val2 = weighted_inv.transpose() * weighted_inv;
112 add_cov += (weights[i] * val1 - val2);
113 }
114 Pk = Kgain * add_cov *Kgain.transpose();
115 // Pk|k = cov_
116 //cov_ = cov_p_ - (1-b0)*Kgain*Sk*Kgain.transpose() + Pk;
117 cov_ = b0*cov_p_ + (1-b0)* (Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(7,7) -Kgain*Ct)*cov_p_;// + (1-b0)*Pk;
118 mean_ += Kgain*weighted_inv;
119 }
120
121
122 void kalmanFilter::measurementUpdate(Eigen::VectorXd measurement)
123 {
124 Eigen::MatrixXd Ct(7,7);
125 Ct = Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(7,7);
126 Eigen::MatrixXd Kgain(7,7);
127 //Qt = Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(7,7); // We measure all..
128 // Estimated standard devs for this task
129 // Position +-2m ( Check catalog for this)
130 // velocity 0.5m/s lets say
131 // Volume similary lets take it as +-2m
132 // Values down belwo are squared values of stddev -> variance.
133 Kgain = cov_p_*Ct.transpose()*((Ct*cov_p_*Ct.transpose()+Qt_).inverse());
134
135 mean_ = mean_p_ + Kgain*(measurement - Ct*mean_p_);
136 cov_ = (Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(7,7) - Kgain*Ct)*cov_p_;
137 }
138
139};
